description:
PuppyRaffle.withdrawFees() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#160-166) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success,None) = feeAddress.call{value: feesToWithdraw}() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#164)
markdown:
[PuppyRaffle.withdrawFees()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L160-L166) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(success,None) = feeAddress.call{value: feesToWithdraw}()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L164)

description: PuppyRaffle.selectWinner() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#127-157) uses a weak PRNG: "winnerIndex = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender,block.timestamp,block.difficulty))) % players.length (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#131-132)"

Base64.decode(string) (lib/base64/base64.sol#68-129) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- decodedLen = (data.length / 4) * 3 (lib/base64/base64.sol#78)
markdown:
[Base64.decode(string)](lib/base64/base64.sol#L68-L129) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [decodedLen = (data.length / 4) * 3](lib/base64/base64.sol#L78)

description:
Base64.encode(bytes) (lib/base64/base64.sol#15-66) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- encodedLen = 4 * ((data.length + 2) / 3) (lib/base64/base64.sol#22)
markdown:
[Base64.encode(bytes)](lib/base64/base64.sol#L15-L66) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [encodedLen = 4 * ((data.length + 2) / 3)](lib/base64/base64.sol#L22)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(address(this).balance == uint256(totalFees),PuppyRaffle: There are currently players active!)

description:
PuppyRaffle.withdrawFees() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#160-166) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(address(this).balance == uint256(totalFees),PuppyRaffle: There are currently players active!) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#161)
markdown:
[PuppyRaffle.withdrawFees()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L160-L166) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool,string)(address(this).balance == uint256(totalFees),PuppyRaffle: There are currently players active!)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L161)

description:
Reentrancy in PuppyRaffle.refund(uint256) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#97-106):
	External calls:
	- address(msg.sender).sendValue(entranceFee) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- players[playerIndex] = address(0) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#104)
	PuppyRaffle.players (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#23) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- PuppyRaffle.enterRaffle(address[]) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#80-93)
	- PuppyRaffle.getActivePlayerIndex(address) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#112-119)
	- PuppyRaffle.players (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#23)
	- PuppyRaffle.refund(uint256) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#97-106)
	- PuppyRaffle.selectWinner() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#127-157)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [PuppyRaffle.refund(uint256)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L97-L106):
	External calls:
	- [address(msg.sender).sendValue(entranceFee)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [players[playerIndex] = address(0)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L104)
	[PuppyRaffle.players](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L23) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [PuppyRaffle.enterRaffle(address[])](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L80-L93)
	- [PuppyRaffle.getActivePlayerIndex(address)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L112-L119)
	- [PuppyRaffle.players](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L23)
	- [PuppyRaffle.refund(uint256)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L97-L106)
	- [PuppyRaffle.selectWinner()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L127-L157)

description: ERC721._transfer(address,address,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#387-402) ignores return value by _holderTokens[from].remove(tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#396)

ERC721._mint(address,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#333-344) ignores return value by _holderTokens[to].add(tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#339)

ERC721.tokenByIndex(uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#180-183) ignores return value by (tokenId,None) = _tokenOwners.at(index) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#181)

ERC721._transfer(address,address,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#387-402) ignores return value by _tokenOwners.set(tokenId,to) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#399)

ERC721._burn(uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#356-374) ignores return value by _tokenOwners.remove(tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#371)

ERC721._mint(address,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#333-344) ignores return value by _tokenOwners.set(tokenId,to) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#341)

ERC721._burn(uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#356-374) ignores return value by _holderTokens[owner].remove(tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#369)

ERC721._transfer(address,address,uint256) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#387-402) ignores return value by _holderTokens[to].add(tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#397)

PuppyRaffle.changeFeeAddress(address).newFeeAddress (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#171) lacks a zero-check on :
		- feeAddress = newFeeAddress (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#172)

PuppyRaffle.constructor(uint256,address,uint256)._feeAddress (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#60) lacks a zero-check on :
		- feeAddress = _feeAddress (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#62)

elements.name: returndata = to.functionCall(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received.selector,_msgSender(),from,tokenId,_data),ERC721: transfer to non ERC721Receiver implementer)

description:
Reentrancy in PuppyRaffle.selectWinner() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#127-157):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = winner.call{value: prizePool}() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#154)
	- _safeMint(winner,tokenId) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#156)
		- returndata = to.functionCall(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received.selector,_msgSender(),from,tokenId,_data),ERC721: transfer to non ERC721Receiver implementer) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#441-447)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: value}(data) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol#119)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,None) = winner.call{value: prizePool}() (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#154)
	- _safeMint(winner,tokenId) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#156)
		- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: value}(data) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol#119)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(address(0),to,tokenId) (lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#343)
		- _safeMint(winner,tokenId) (src/PuppyRaffle.sol#156)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [PuppyRaffle.selectWinner()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L127-L157):
	External calls:
	- [(success,None) = winner.call{value: prizePool}()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L154)
	- [_safeMint(winner,tokenId)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L156)
		- [returndata = to.functionCall(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received.selector,_msgSender(),from,tokenId,_data),ERC721: transfer to non ERC721Receiver implementer)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#L441-L447)
		- [(success,returndata) = target.call{value: value}(data)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol#L119)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [(success,None) = winner.call{value: prizePool}()](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L154)
	- [_safeMint(winner,tokenId)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L156)
		- [(success,returndata) = target.call{value: value}(data)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol#L119)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Transfer(address(0),to,tokenId)](lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#L343)
		- [_safeMint(winner,tokenId)](src/PuppyRaffle.sol#L156)
